text: while Sarah and I were trying to choose

want to soak that a little bit with some
bitters
I love bitters so I'm gonna add four
dashes but it's all to taste next you're

of water just to help that sugar melt
and give that a nice stir until the

you're gonna want to add the Bourbon can

and for a drink like this you want a

slowly just drop it in and now the

make sure you pinch it over the cocktail
